whatIsAIstanbul.question: What is AI Istanbul Guide?
whatIsAIstanbul.answer: AI Istanbul Guide is an advanced AI-powered travel assistant that provides personalized recommendations for restaurants, attractions, transportation, and cultural experiences throughout Istanbul. Our platform combines real-time data with local expertise to deliver the most accurate and relevant travel advice.

accuracy.question: How accurate and reliable are your recommendations?
accuracy.answer: Our recommendations are powered by real-time data from Google Maps API, combined with advanced AI analysis and local expertise. We maintain partnerships with local businesses and continuously update our database to ensure accuracy. All restaurant data includes current ratings, reviews, and availability status.

coverage.question: Which areas of Istanbul do you cover?
coverage.answer: We provide comprehensive coverage of all Istanbul districts including Sultanahmet, Beyoğlu, Kadıköy, Beşiktaş, Üsküdar, Galata, Taksim, and many more. Our database includes over 10,000 locations with detailed information about restaurants, museums, attractions, and transportation options.

whatIsKam.question: What does KAM mean?
whatIsKam.answer: KAM is an AI chatbot named after the ancient Turkic 'kam' — a wise shamanic figure who served as a bridge between the human and spiritual worlds. In this modern form, Kam embodies the same spirit of guidance, insight, and protection, helping users navigate the vast digital world with clarity and wisdom.

businessPartnerships.question: Do you work with local businesses and restaurants?
businessPartnerships.answer: Yes, we partner with carefully selected restaurants, hotels, and tour operators throughout Istanbul. Our business partnerships allow us to provide exclusive offers, verified information, and special experiences for our users while maintaining editorial independence in our recommendations.

dataPrivacy.question: How do you protect user data and privacy?
dataPrivacy.answer: We take data privacy seriously and comply with GDPR and international privacy standards. User data is encrypted, securely stored, and never sold to third parties. We only collect necessary information to improve your travel experience and provide personalized recommendations.

updates.question: How often do you update your information?
updates.answer: We update our database continuously with real-time information from Google Maps API and other reliable sources. Restaurant details, opening hours, ratings, and availability are refreshed regularly. We also conduct monthly reviews of our AI recommendations to ensure accuracy and relevance.

free.question: Is AI Istanbul Guide really free to use?
free.answer: Yes, AI Istanbul Guide is completely free to use with no hidden costs, subscriptions, or premium features. We believe everyone should have access to quality travel information about Istanbul. The service is supported by community donations and our commitment to keeping travel resources accessible to all.
